医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现迷幻药物会导致大鼠脑电波同步隆德大学的研究人员开发了一种技术，可以同时测量清醒大鼠大脑 128 个区域的电信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Psychedelic-drugs-cause-synchronized-brain-waves-in-rats-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Psychedelic-drugs-cause-synchronized-brain-waves-in-rats-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=718acf7b-264f-40c9-a6d5-5b12fe2ceb66 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 14:09:59 -0400 Psychedelic drugs cause synchronized brain waves in rats, study finds
RAGE 在侵袭性三阴性乳腺癌的可塑性细胞机制中发挥关键作用由 Vall d'Hebron 肿瘤研究所 (VHIO) 研究员 Josep Villanueva 领导的一项研究在《Oncogene》杂志上在线发表，该研究表明晚期糖基化终产物 (RAGE) 受体在间充质三阴性乳腺癌（TNBC）中可塑性的细胞机制，将上皮细胞转化为间充质细胞，作为癌细胞增殖和肿瘤侵袭的有效驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/RAGE-plays-key-role-in-cellular-mechanisms-of- Plasticity-in-aggressive-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/RAGE-plays-key-role-in-cellular-mechanisms-of- Plasticity-in-aggressive-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81dbc896-c306-4e08-af98-c59cc235d637 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 13:53:11 -0400 RAGE plays key role in cellular mechanisms of plasticity in aggressive triple-negative breast cancer
研究表明细胞色素 P450 酶表现出独特的软机器人特性研究揭示了生命系统中纳米机器领域的一项重要发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Cytochromes-P450-enzymes-exhibit-unique-soft-robotic-properties-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Cytochromes-P450-enzymes-exhibit-unique-soft-robotic-properties-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=334e08de-9a9b-4118-bdf9-4a029e63667b Tue, 08 Aug 2023 13:15:13 -0400 Cytochromes P450 enzymes exhibit unique soft-robotic properties, study reveals
研究表明记忆和遗忘是社会学习的关键关于人类和非人类文化最激烈争论的问题之一是：在什么情况下我们可以期望文化，特别是相互学习的能力，受到自然选择的青睐？德国莱比锡马克斯·普朗克进化人类学研究所的研究人员开发了社会学习进化的模拟模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Memory-and-forgetting-are-key-to-social-learning-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Memory-and-forgetting-are-key-to-social-learning-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71e69df2-400e-4d88-b8cb-602cc9a39f41 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 13:02:00 -0400 Memory and forgetting are key to social learning, study suggests
用于追踪单个细胞健康状况的纳米级纹身工程师们开发出了纳米级纹身——附着在活细胞上的点和线——这是一项突破，使研究人员距离追踪单个细胞的健康又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Nanoscale-tattoos-for-tracking-the-health-of-individual-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Nanoscale-tattoos-for-tracking-the-health-of-individual-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09c3c448-1d7f-4d49-98c8-f28e6edfe098 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 12:41:32 -0400 Nanoscale tattoos for tracking the health of individual cells
线粒体蛋白质结构激活细胞的综合应激反应线粒体通常被称为“细胞的动力室”，因其作为能量供应者的作用而闻名，但这些细胞器对于维持我们的整体健康也至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/线粒体-蛋白质-结构-激活-细胞-集成-压力-响应.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/线粒体-蛋白质-结构-激活-细胞-集成-压力-响应.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=338dcd7d-ac65-416e-b7f2-98ab36ef1352 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 12:29:21 -0400 Mitochondrial protein structure activates cell's integrated stress response
阿育吠陀药物与年轻女性的铅中毒有关CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）上的一篇文章重点介绍了一名年轻女性因阿育吠陀药物导致铅中毒的案例，以及诊断这种罕见疾病的复杂性 https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj。 230592。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Ayurvedic-medicines-linked-to-lead-毒性-in-young-woman.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Ayurvedic-medicines-linked-to-lead-毒性-in-young-woman.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04100136-9135-4282-9763-07f5574aab73 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 12:08:10 -0400 Ayurvedic medicines linked to lead toxicity in young woman

以学校为基础的干预措施为促进青少年心血管健康提供了机会研究人员讨论 SI 的结果！西班牙青少年中学试验计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/School-based-interventions-offer-opportunity-to-promote-cardioangio-health-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/School-based-interventions-offer-opportunity-to-promote-cardioangio-health-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c4636e2-2972-4796-865c-6b28da41fe7e Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:18:00 -0400 School-based interventions offer opportunity to promote cardiovascular health in adolescents
